project_context: house.fun — High-stakes crypto casino on Solana. Features: encrypted coin flips, memecoin UFC battles, virtual horse racing with sponsorships, and Arcium-encrypted poker. Primary: #08CB00 (Money Green), Secondary: #B4E50D (Lime), Danger: #FF3F33 (Red). Background: #0A0A0F. Accent: #F59E0B (Gold for wins/jackpots). Surface: #141420. Text: #FFFFFF, #A1A1AA (secondary). Style: Glassmorphism, neon glow, zero purple, luxury casino meets web3 degen culture.

screens.title: Flip It - Main Game
screens.prompt: Dark casino coin flip interface. Background #0A0A0F. Header: 'FLIP IT' title with gold coin icon, wallet balance (SOL), win streak with fire emoji. Center: Large 3D gold coin (180px) with embossed 'H', subtle golden glow (#F59E0B at 30% opacity). Below coin: Toggle buttons 'HEADS' (#08CB00 bg) and 'TAILS' (#FF3F33 bg), both with white text. Bet controls: Slider with #B4E50D handle, SOL amount input with +/- buttons, min 0.1 max 100. Large 'FLIP NOW' button full width #08CB00. Right sidebar: 'Recent Flips' glassmorphism panel showing last 10 results with H/T icon, amount, green/red profit. Mobile: Stack vertically, hide sidebar. No purple anywhere.

screens.title: Flip It - Win State
screens.prompt: Victory celebration overlay on dark #0A0A0F. Lime (#B4E50D) and gold (#F59E0B) confetti particles falling. Large gold coin in center with winning side showing. 'YOU WON!' text 48px bold #08CB00 with subtle glow. Payout amount '+2.5 SOL' in gold #F59E0B. Two buttons: 'DOUBLE OR NOTHING' #08CB00 bg, 'COLLECT' outline #B4E50D. Sound wave visualization hint. No purple.

screens.title: Flip It - Loss State
screens.prompt: Loss state on dark #0A0A0F. Coin showing losing side with red tint. 'TOUGH LUCK' text in #FF3F33. Amount lost '-1.0 SOL'. 'TRY AGAIN' button #08CB00, 'CHANGE BET' outline button. Subtle, not depressing — encouraging retry. No purple.

screens.title: Memecoin Fight Club - Fight Card
screens.prompt: UFC-style memecoin battle card. Dark #0A0A0F bg. Two fighter panels 45% width each. LEFT (Red Corner): Red glow border #FF3F33, token logo circle 80px, name 'BONK' 32px bold, price '$0.00002341', 24h change badge, health bar 100/100 in #08CB00. RIGHT (Blue Corner): Green glow border #08CB00, token logo 80px, name 'WIF', price '$2.45', health bar. CENTER: 'VS' 48px white with #B4E50D glow, weight class badge 'MIDDLEWEIGHT', fight timer. BOTTOM betting panel: glassmorphism card, 'BET RED' and 'BET GREEN' buttons with dynamic odds (1.85x, 2.10x), bet amount slider, 'PLACE BET' #08CB00. Stats row: Total pool, your position, time remaining. No purple.

screens.title: Memecoin Fight Club - Live Battle
screens.prompt: Real-time battle view. Same layout as fight card but health bars depleted: Left 67/100 (yellow #F59E0B), Right 45/100 (orange). Floating damage numbers '-8 HP' in red, 'CRITICAL!' sparks. Price tickers updating. Battle log sidebar scrolling events. Screen border pulsing with tension. Timer urgently counting. 'BATTLE ENDS IN 23s'. Live odds shifting. Crowd energy meter. No purple.

screens.title: Degen Derby - Betting Screen
screens.prompt: Pre-race betting hub. Header: 'RACE #42 — Memecoin Championship', countdown 'GATES OPEN IN 2:34' in #B4E50D digital font. 2x4 grid of horse cards. Each card: HIGH-QUALITY REALISTIC 3D HORSE render (side profile, dynamic pose), horse number badge, name 'BONK BLAZER', current odds '8.5x', form dots, sponsor logo slot. Selected card has #B4E50D glow border. Right panel: Bet builder with bet type tabs (WIN/PLACE/SHOW/EXACTA), selected horses list, stake input, potential payout calc, 'PLACE BET' #08CB00. Pool size display. No icons, realistic horses only. No purple.

screens.title: Degen Derby - Race Track
screens.prompt: Top-down oval race track. Dark outer area #0A0A0F. Track surface dark green #1a2f1a. 8 lanes with neon #B4E50D dividers and lane numbers. 8 REALISTIC 3D HORSES mid-race, different positions showing competition. Start/finish line. 'RACE IN PROGRESS' banner top. Position markers on each horse. Right leaderboard: positions 1-8, horse name, jockey colors, odds, green/red arrows for position changes. Bottom: Your bet status, potential payout. Race timer. Dust/motion effects. No purple.

screens.title: Shadow Poker - Table View
screens.prompt: Luxury encrypted poker table. Bird's eye view. Oval table with dark green felt (#1a3d1a), dark wood mahogany edge. 6 player positions evenly spaced. Each seat: glassmorphism info panel, avatar circle, username, chip stack, 2 face-down cards with LOCK icon (Arcium encrypted). Dealer button. CENTER: 5 community cards (3 face up, 2 down), pot display 'POT: 250 USDC', 'ENCRYPTED BY ARCIUM' badge with lock. YOUR POSITION (bottom center): 2 enlarged hole cards revealed to you only. ACTION BAR: 'FOLD' #FF3F33, 'CHECK' white/gray, 'CALL 50' white, 'RAISE' #08CB00 with slider. Timer ring around active player in #B4E50D, 30s countdown. Chat toggle. Zero purple.

screens.title: Shadow Poker - Showdown
screens.prompt: Hand reveal moment. All remaining players' cards flipping face-up with decryption animation. Winning hand highlighted with gold #F59E0B glow. Hand rank text 'FULL HOUSE — Aces over Kings'. Winner's seat enlarged with gold crown effect. Pot amount animating to winner '+450 USDC'. Losers' cards grayed. 'NEXT HAND IN 5s' countdown. 'LEAVE TABLE' button. Confetti for big wins. No purple.

screens.title: Casino Lobby
screens.prompt: Main hub screen. Dark #0A0A0F. Header: 'house.fun' logo (house silhouette in #08CB00), wallet connect button #08CB00, balance display. Hero: 'The House Always Wins. So Can You.' tagline, jackpot ticker. 4 game cards in grid: FLIP IT (gold coin icon, 'LIVE' green badge), FIGHT CLUB (boxing gloves, red/green split), DEGEN DERBY (horse silhouette, 'NEXT RACE 2:00'), SHADOW POKER (cards with lock). Each card: glassmorphism, hover glow, player count, 'PLAY NOW' button. Stats bar: Total volume, players online, games today. Footer: socials, hackathon badge. No purple.
